data.eml:eml: Information about moss occurrence on the territory European North-East Russia. The data was obtained from the labels of the herbarium (SYKO) moss collection of the Institute of biology of the Komi Scientific Сenter of the Ural Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences. The information from the labels was recognized, cleaned and brought into compliance with the Darwin Core. Information about each occurrence was linked to geographic coordinates with a precision of at least 3 km. For each record of occurrence the digital image of original label was attached.The herbarium labels for this dataset were mobilized with support from The Global Biodiversity Information Facility Secretariat (GBIFS). Project ID: project ID, Russia2019_04. Project web-page: https://www.gbif.org/project/5ZsAifyI6z0OguyoNTFIIu/mobilizing-moss-occurrences-from-the-komi-science-centre-herbarium
